name: Escape from Yandagav
description:
Escaping a maze-like lab with only your teleporter and stun-grenade in hand, avoid the deformed creature before it captures you!

Features 

• In order to fully immerse the player in this fast paced survival horror, this will be a first-person game.

• As this is a first person, the only thing that will be in the field of view is what is in the player’s hand as well as what is located just in front.

•  Simple movement will make traversing the lab easy and simple for a first time player, however our teleporter mechanic will allow the player to do unique and strategic actions to avoid the enemy

• Besides the teleporter, the player will pick up other hand-held items such as a Stun-Grenade. Since the enemy is part machine, using an electrical grenade will easily stun the enemy for a short duration

• Other smaller items to pick up would be a key to unlock the final door and escape the level, as well as small lore secrets scattered throughout the level allowing for theorists and casual gamers alike to start piecing together the deeper story within

• An important part about any survival horror games is the location of hiding spaces, these are scattered throughout the levels and allow the player to hide and become immune for a short amount of time while the enemy continues to patrol the level

• And the most important thing to any survival horror game is the enemy itself. The enemy will begin patrolling the level when the player awakens it upon nearing its hibernating frame. Once spotted, the enemy will chase the player until it either loses sight of the player or it catches the player, killing them instantly.
